dcterms:creator: Bakker
dcterms:description: The T-Maze environment is used to evaluate an agent’s ability to learn long context dependencies in a reinforcement learning scenario. The agent must remember a cue shown only at the beginning of an episode to decide which way to turn at the end of a hallway.
dcterms:title: T-Maze

dcterms:creator: Marco Pleines
Matthias Pallasch
Frank Zimmer
Mike Preuss
dcterms:description: Mystery Path is a pixel-based navigation task that requires the agent to memorize a long sequence of steps to reach a target position.
dcterms:title: Mystery Path

dcterms:creator: Jurgis Paˇsukonis
Timothy P Lillicrap
Danijar Hafner
dcterms:description: Memory Maze is a 3D navigation environment that requires the agent to remember multiple cue signals for long periods of time while navigating through a maze.
dcterms:title: Memory Maze

dcterms:creator: Andrew G Barto
Sutton
Charles W Anderson
dcterms:description: CartPole is a classic control problem where the agent must balance a pole on a cart by applying forces to the left or right.
dcterms:title: CartPole
